alert.note: Alert for White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 6:03PM EDT until August 06 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL WHITE COUNTY... At 602 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Brookston, or 12 miles south of Monticello, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central White County. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN <50 MPH
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
